trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_000_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>Congratulations on your purchase of the ※★ workshop, a ★※☆ of the─of the─of the─ “Impeccable quality” is our motto!<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_Q1_000_000<tab>What would you like to ask about?
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A1_000_001<tab>This workshop's facilities.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A1_000_002<tab>Company crafting.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A1_000_003<tab>Drafting plans for new projects.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A1_000_004<tab>Voyage control panel.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A1_000_006<tab>Exploratory missions.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A1_000_005<tab>Nothing.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_110_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>Your new ※★ workshop is equipped with the latest in ★※☆, allowing you to ※☆★※☆ the envy of your friends and neighbors!<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_110_001<tab>You may use your workshop's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>fabrication station<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to begin a new project or manage one in progress.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_110_002<tab>Projects may require the cooperation of free company members due to the amount of materials required. To facilitate this process, a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>company chest<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> is also available.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_110_003<tab>Plans for new projects can be drafted with the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>schematic board<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_120_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>Airship components? Aetherial wheel stands? ★※☆※? Whatever your dream, the ※★ workshop can help you make it a reality!<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you ask about?
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A2_000_001<tab>The company crafting log.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A2_000_002<tab>Contributing materials.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A2_000_003<tab>Construction quality.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A2_000_004<tab>Advancing to the next production phase.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A2_000_005<tab>Evaluating progress.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_210_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>Even the best culinarian needs a cookbook, which is why the ※★ workshop comes with a ★※☆※★☆ of projects so ※★☆※ even a child could follow!<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_210_001<tab>To begin a new project, open the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>company crafting log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> via the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>fabrication station<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, then select the item you wish to construct followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Begin<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_210_002<tab>Be advised that many projects are comprised of multiple <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>production phases<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_210_003<tab>Each phase will require different materials to complete, which can be reviewed via the company crafting log.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_210_004<tab>Full estate exterior projects are especially complex and must be constructed one section at a time. These sections may be comprised of multiple production phases, so take care to confirm the requirements beforehand.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_220_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>We here at ※☆★ like to say, “The ★※☆※ that ※★ together ★※☆ together!”<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_220_001<tab>In order to advance to the next <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>production phase<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, your free company will need to contribute sufficient materials.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_220_002<tab>Materials can be contributed via the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>fabrication station<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_220_003<tab>Please note that a large quantity of materials, crafted or gathered by a variety of classes, may be required.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_220_004<tab>If you wish to complete projects quickly, you must enlist the support of as many free company members as possible.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_230_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>Remember ※☆★: quality materials make for ★※☆※!<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_230_001<tab>When contributing materials to a project, there is a chance that the construction <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>quality<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will increase.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_230_002<tab>Construction quality will influence the amount of progress made when advancing to the next production phase or completing a project.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_240_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>When it's time to ★※☆, make sure you're prepared! Don't forget your ※★☆※!<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_240_002<tab>In order to advance to the next production phase, you must first change classes to a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Disciple of the Hand<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_250_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>Great project, or greatest project? It all depends on ★※☆※!<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_250_001<tab>Depending on your construction quality, when advancing to the next production phase, there is a chance you will make <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>excellent<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> or <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>outstanding<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> progress.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_250_002<tab>There is also a chance that your fabrication <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>conditions<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> may change as well.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_250_003<tab>Improved progress and conditions will result in reduced material requirements for the subsequent production phase, as well as bonuses when contributing to the project.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_130_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>Not satisfied with your choice of projects? ※★ something new and ※☆★ with the aid of your trusty ★※☆!<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_130_001<tab>To draft a new project, access the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>schematic board<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, then select the type of plan you wish to create. Review the requirements for the available plans, then select the one you wish to draft.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_130_002<tab>New plans will be automatically added to the company crafting log and can be used immediately following creation.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_140_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>To slip the surly bonds of ※☆★ and touch the face of ※★. To fly above the clouds! To dive beneath the waves! The dream of man and ★※★ alike...<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_Q3_000_000<tab>What would you like to ask about?
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A3_000_001<tab>Outfitting and registering an airship.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A3_000_002<tab>Choosing airship components.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A3_000_003<tab>Managing capacity.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A3_000_004<tab>Exploratory voyage deployment.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A3_000_005<tab>Analyzing voyage logs.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A3_000_006<tab>Repairing damaged components.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_310_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>Eager to get started? All you need is ※☆★ and quality ★※☆※!<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_310_001<tab>To outfit and register an airship, you must have in your possession the requisite components and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>flight credits<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_310_002<tab>Flight credits can be purchased from resident caretakers with company credits, whereas <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>airship components<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> can be constructed in your company workshop. Please note that hull, rigging, forecastle, and aftcastle components are required to outfit an airship.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_320_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>Having trouble picking the right ★※☆ for you? Not to worry! ※★☆※ put it best when ※★ said, “★※☆※※☆★.”<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_320_001<tab>Each component will affect your airship's performance in a variety of ways.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_320_002<tab>You may wish to change components depending on how you intend to deploy your airship.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_330_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>Don't forget that there are limits to ※☆★, even if you have all the ★※☆※!<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_330_001<tab>Airship components are comprised of multiple <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>parts<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. The combined total of all component parts cannot exceed the vessel's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>capacity<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_330_002<tab>As your airship's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rank<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> increases, the vessel's capacity will as well.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_330_003<tab>Your airship's rank will increase as it gains experience via exploratory voyages.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_340_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>Your ★※☆※ mammet is the perfect ※☆★, equipped to handle all eventualities─such as ★※☆※, ★※☆, or even something so patently ridiculous and unlikely as ★※☆※※☆★!<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_340_001<tab>To chart an exploratory voyage, access the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>voyage control panel<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and select an airship, followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Deploy airship on exploratory voyage<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Once you have finalized the details, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Deploy<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, and the voyage will commence.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_340_002<tab>Each voyage will require a number of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>ceruleum tanks<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, which can be purchased with company credits from the mammet voyager #004A or resident caretakers.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_340_003<tab>Once your airship returns, you can review the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>voyage log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and collect any items found during the voyage. These items may prove useful in drafting plans for new projects.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_340_004<tab>As you continue to conduct exploratory voyages, you will gain access to facilities for registering and housing additional company airships.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_350_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>※☆★ agrees: there's nothing more ★※※★☆※☆ than your mammet's first voyage log!<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_350_001<tab>Upon the completion of an exploratory voyage, your mammet will provide a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>voyage log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> detailing the results.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_350_002<tab>The information contained in this log may prove useful in preparing for your next exploratory voyage.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_350_003<tab>Please note that only the log for the previous voyage will be retained.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_360_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>Though it may seem troublesome at first, we believe you'll find that the care and maintenance of your airship is ※★☆※ as ※★☆※!<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_360_001<tab>The condition of your airship's components will decrease with each exploratory voyage.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_360_002<tab>Should a component's condition reach 0%, it will suffer <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>catastrophic failure<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, and you will be unable to deploy your airship.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_360_003<tab>To repair a component, access the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>voyage control panel<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and select an airship, followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Repair airship components<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Please note that you cannot do so without the requisite materials.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_150_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>Do you crave adventure and excitement? Glory and wealth? Are you prepared to accept ★※☆※※☆★ violent death? Then to you brave souls we say come─the Diadem awaits!<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_150_001<tab><var 1A 02 /var>This new frontier is filled with untold spoils ripe for the taking! With ★※☆※, you can be assured that ★※☆※★※☆※!<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_Q4_000_000<tab>What would you like to ask about?
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A4_000_001<tab>Exploratory mission requirements.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A4_000_002<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A4_000_003<tab>Missions involving two or more parties.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A4_000_004<tab>Rewards obtained during exploratory missions.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_410_001<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>Make sure not to forget your ★※☆※! Our research shows that expeditions with ★※☆※ have a 50% chance of ※☆★ more than 10% of the time!<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_410_002<tab>In order to embark upon an exploratory mission, you and your party must meet the following requirements:
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_410_011<tab>All party members must have completed the main scenario quest “Heavensward.”
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_410_012<tab>All party members must be level 60 Disciples of War or Magic.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_410_003<tab>Furthermore, all party members must be in possession of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>mission ceruleum<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, which may be purchased from resident caretakers or the mammet voyager #004A.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_410_004<tab>It is possible to participate in missions by forming parties consisting of two or more members.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_410_005<tab>If you wish to embark upon a mission with less than eight players, you may do so via the voyage control panel. However, please be advised that you will be unable to add new members during the mission.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_410_013<tab>Please also be aware that Disciples of War or Magic higher than level 60 will be automatically level synced upon entry.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_410_006<tab>Exploratory missions are subject to a time limit, and you will earn a reward by completing mission objectives within the time given.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_510_005<tab>Successfully completing a mission also earns you the ability to manipulate aetherial gaps, allowing you to pass beyond the Grounding Gale.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_510_006<tab>Furthermore, please be advised that you will not be permitted to change to a Disciple of the Land or Hand while on a Trials of the Fury exploratory mission.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_410_007<tab>All items in a player's loot list will automatically be transferred to that player's inventory upon all other party members leaving the area.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_410_008<tab>Items unable to be obtained will be lost.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_410_009<tab>Please note that once you have participated in an exploratory mission, you may not do so again for 30 minutes (Earth time).
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_410_010<tab>Moreover, the airship which you used to embark upon your mission may not be deployed on missions or voyages for 5 minutes (Earth time).
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_420_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_420_002<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_420_003<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_440_001<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>What wonders can be found in the Diadem? How about ★※☆※★☆? Or ※☆★? And yes, even ★※☆※! That's right, brave adventurer! Honest-to-gods ★※☆※!<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_441_001<tab>Lockboxes obtained during missions can be opened by a picker of locks─a specialist found in Ishgard, the Diadem, or in any residential area.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_441_002<tab>Once opened, you have a chance to receive rewards such as Diadem gear or brass sky pirate spoils.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_440_003<tab>The special gear obtained during the course of an exploratory mission can be exchanged for <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>brass sky pirate spoils<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> by speaking with spoils traders in Ishgard, the Diadem, or in any residential district.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_440_103<tab>Moreover, Disciples of the Land can gather <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>steel sky pirate spoils<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the Diadem after completing a Trials of the Matron mission.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_440_004<tab>These spoils can then be redeemed for a variety of valuable goods by speaking with spoils collectors, who can be found in the company of spoils traders.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_Q5_000_000<tab>What would you like to ask about?
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A5_000_001<tab>Managing an airship.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A5_000_002<tab>Managing a submersible.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_Q6_000_000<tab>What would you like to ask about?
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A6_000_001<tab>Outfitting and registering a submersible.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A6_000_002<tab>Choosing submersible components.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A6_000_003<tab>Managing capacity.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A6_000_004<tab>Subaquatic voyage deployment.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A6_000_005<tab>Analyzing voyage logs.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A6_000_006<tab>Repairing damaged components.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_A6_000_007<tab>Rank and performance.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_610_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>Eager to get wet? All you need is ※☆★ and watertight ★※☆※!<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_610_001<tab>To outfit and register a submersible, you must have in your possession the requisite components and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>dive credits<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_610_002<tab>Dive credits can be purchased from resident caretakers with company credits, whereas <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>submersible components<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> can be constructed in your company workshop. Please note that hull, stern, bow, and bridge components are required to outfit a submersible.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_620_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>Having trouble picking the right ★※☆ for you? Not to worry! ※★☆※ put it best when ※★ said, “★※☆※※☆★.”<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_620_001<tab>Each component will affect your submersible's performance in a variety of ways.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_620_002<tab>You may wish to change components depending on how you intend to deploy your submersible.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_630_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>Don't forget that there are limits to ※☆★, even if you have all the ★※☆※!<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_630_001<tab>Submersible components are comprised of multiple <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>parts<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. The combined total of all component parts cannot exceed the vessel's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>capacity<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_630_002<tab>As your submersible's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rank<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> increases, the vessel's capacity will as well.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_630_003<tab>Your submersible's rank will increase as it gains experience via subaquatic voyages.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_640_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>Your ★※☆※ mammet is the perfect ※☆★, equipped to handle all eventualities─such as ★※☆※, ★※☆, or even something so patently ridiculous and unlikely as ★※☆※※☆★!<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_640_001<tab>To chart a subaquatic voyage, access the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>voyage control panel<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and select a submersible, followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Deploy submersible on subaquatic voyage<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Once you have finalized the details, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Deploy<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, and the voyage will commence.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_640_002<tab>Each voyage will require a number of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>ceruleum tanks<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, which can be purchased with company credits from the mammet voyager #004A or resident caretakers.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_640_003<tab>Once your submersible returns, you can review the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>voyage log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and collect any items found during the voyage. These items may prove useful in drafting plans for new projects.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_640_004<tab>As you continue to conduct subaquatic voyages, you will gain access to facilities for registering and housing additional company submersibles.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_650_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>※☆★ agrees: there's nothing more ★※※★☆※☆ than your mammet's first voyage log!<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_650_001<tab>Upon the completion of a subaquatic voyage, your mammet will provide a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>voyage log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> detailing the results.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_650_002<tab>The information contained in this log may prove useful in preparing for your next voyage.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_650_003<tab>Please note that only the log for the previous voyage will be retained.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_660_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>Though it may seem irksome at first, we believe you'll find that the care and maintenance of your submersible is ※★☆※ as ※★☆※!<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_660_001<tab>The condition of your submersible's components will decrease with each subaquatic voyage.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_660_002<tab>Should a component's condition reach 0%, it will suffer <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>catastrophic failure<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, and you will be unable to deploy your submersible.

TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_660_003<tab>To repair a component, access the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>voyage control panel<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and select a submersible, followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Repair submersible components<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Please note that you cannot do so without the requisite materials.
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_MAMMET00263_670_000<tab>BZZZT...★※☆ <var 1A 02 /var>With enough practice, we mammets can ※★☆※ just about any ※★☆※!<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFWORKSHOPGUIDE_00263_SYSTEM_670_001<tab>Every increase in rank from 51 upwards will improve the submersible's performance in a variety of ways.
